class.name: wxAnimationCtrl
class.description:
This is a static control which displays an animation.

wxAnimationCtrl API is as simple as possible and won't give you full control on the animation; if you need it then use wxMediaCtrl.

This control is useful to display a (small) animation while doing a long task (e.g. a "throbber").

It is only available if wxUSE_ANIMATIONCTRL is set to 1 (the default).

flag.name: wxAC_NO_AUTORESIZE
flag.description: By default, the control will adjust its size to exactly fit to the size of the animation when SetAnimation is called. If this style flag is given, the control will not change its size.

url.name: animation
url.label: Animation
url.description: Sets the animation to play in this control.

bitmap.name: inactive-bitmap
bitmap.label: Inactive bitmap
bitmap.description: Sets the bitmap to show on the control when it's not playing an animation.
